title: HOW TO MAKE A PBE ACCOUNT AFTER YOU HAVE BEEN ACCEPTED????
body: basically i went to the league website and signed up to see if i could have a pbe account a few weeks later riot sent and email to me saying i was autherized to make an account and sent me a link in the email to sign up a pbe account, however the link lead me to a page where it said error something went hextechnically wrong cyberbots are working on a fix etc. so i left the page and came back 3 times different parts of the day and on the following day even however it kept comming up saying error and stuff so how do i make an account for the pbe?

replies.body: Based on reports I've seen, this may be a connection issue.  You might be able to fix this by using another device, browser/incognito, or a VPN like [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [CyberGhost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/).  Hope that helps!
I have done all of these and have still yet been able to make my account :/
